import React, { useState, useCallback } from 'react' import { useChannels } from '../../contexts/ChannelsProvider'; export default function OpenConversation() { const { sendMessage, selectedChannel } = useChannels() const [text, setText] = useState('') const setRef = useCallback(node => { if (node) { node.scrollIntoView({ smooth: true }) } }, []) function deleteChannel() { console.log("test") } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() sendMessage( selectedChannel.recipients.map(r => r.id), text ) setText('') } var lastSenderNow; return (
{selectedChannel.recipients.map(r => r.pseudo).join(', ')}
{ selectedChannel.messages.map((message, index) => { const lastMessage = selectedChannel.messages.length - 1 === index // Détecte si plus de deux messages a la suite sont du même destinataire var lastSenderPass = lastSenderNow; lastSenderNow = message.sender; return ( lastSenderNow !== lastSenderPass ?

{message.fromMe ? 'You' : message.senderName} Date none

{message.text}
:
{message.text}
) }) }
) }
